changelog: Fixed 2FA setup and verification (database column size, user ID field)
Added 2FA login enforcement - prompts for code during login
Fixed NaNmin display in backup durations
Updated website screenshots to show correct St0r interface
Fixed screenshots showing file and image level backup status
Added carousel/lightbox screenshot viewer to project page
File Browser - Browse and download files from any backup
File Restore - Restore multiple files directly to client
Bare Metal Restore - ISO downloads and instructions
Real-time backup progress with transfer speed and ETA
